title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Foundations of Gaussian Wiretap Channel Security Code Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of communication theory and basic understanding of information security
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the fundamental principles and security requirements of Gaussian wiretap channels
Learners can implement step-by-step a secure code design process using autoencoders and hash functions.
The error probability and information leakage measurement method at short block lengths (≤128) can be verified through simulation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
